amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the FCC from taking any action that would restrict COMSAT activities in a manner which would create a liability under the Fifth Amendment to the Constitution relating to the takings of private property.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 6 in the Congressional Record of May 5, 1998 to prohibit the FCC from taking any action that would restrict COMSAT activities in a manner that would constitute an uncompensated "taking" of private property in violation of the Fifth Amendment to the Constitution.

action.text: On agreeing to the Morella amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 111 - 304, 2 Present (Roll No. 127).
